text:
Question 83) Amphibians represent the first group of vertebrates that evolutionarily won the earthly environment. Nevertheless, the group's survival still remains restricted to wet or aquatic environments due to the maintenance of some water -related physiological characteristics.
One of the characteristics to which the text refers to is the
A) Reproduction by viviparity.
B) pulmonary breathing in adults.
C) thermal regulation by endothermia.
D) thin and highly permeable body coverage.
E) developed anterior and posterior limbs.
